resources.string: "Along with bug fixes, this update also includes new and enhanced features."
"This update corrects bugs in the app. It does not contain any new features."
"Changes in this release can be found in the app information, under “New Features”."

string-array.name: new_release_body
string-array.item: "The Corona-Warn-App now contains a “Pandemic Radar” tile, which takes you directly to a Robert Koch Institute website (in German) when tapped. The Pandemic Radar contains a variety of statistics on the coronavirus pandemic, which are updated every working day. Please note that any data used when opening the website will be deducted from your data plan and that the website is not designed to be barrier-free."
